name: memories
description: Memories is a self-hosted photo and video backup tool with web UI for media browsing. It supports deduplication, metadata, face and object recognition while syncing from multiple devices.
features: Photo backup: Automatically sync photos and videos from mobile devices to your server.
Face recognition: Identify and group photos by detected faces for easy person-based browsing.
Object detection: Automatically tag photos with detected objects, scenes, and activities.
Timeline view: Browse your photo collection chronologically with smooth infinite scrolling.
Album organization: Create and manage albums to group related photos and videos.
Metadata extraction: Read and display EXIF data including location, camera settings, and timestamps.
Deduplication: Automatically detect and handle duplicate photos to save storage space.
Map view: View photos on a map based on GPS coordinates from image metadata.
Search functionality: Find photos by date, location, people, or detected objects.
Sharing: Generate secure links to share albums or individual photos with others.
Mobile apps: Access your photo library from iOS and Android devices with native apps.
Video support: Store and stream videos with thumbnail generation and playback controls.
